snippet: A report dated Aug. 16 and released Sept. 11 by a commission of inquiry on Syria, attributes eight massacres to government forces and one to rebel fighters.
lead_paragraph: A report dated Aug. 16 and released Sept. 11 by a commission of inquiry on Syria, attributes eight massacres to government forces and one to rebel fighters.

headline.main: U.N. Rights Panel’s Report on War Crimes in Syria

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
